paragraphs: I've been working as a full time developer for more than 10 years and for over 20 years between other realities and industries. My background in surveying and security has given me a unique perspective on problem-solving and project management.

I like finding and solving problems, optimizing processes and creating new things, using the toolset that I grow whenever possible, exploring the ever growing pool of new technologies that comes out every week.
When I am not working I like to spend time learning new things, playing games and most importantly spending time with my pet companion.
about.subtitle: And my partner in crime
about.title: About

contact.subtitle: Have a question or want to work together? Send me a message and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.title: Get in Touch

hero.description: I specialize in building modern, responsive solutions with a focus on clean design, performance, and accessibility.
hero.subtitle: Solving problems with code and design

projects.subtitle: A short collection of work, personal projects and open source contributions that I can share.
projects.title: Featured Projects

skills.subtitle: The most important resource is the ability to learn, adapt and have the right tools to achieve the goals. Growing the toolset with new technologies is a continuous process.
skills.title: Skillset
